snippet: Representative Michele Bachmann of Minnesota declined to drop out of the Republican presidential contest despite having come in last in the Iowa caucus.
abstract: Representative Michele Bachmann of Minnesota declined to drop out of the Republican presidential contest despite having come in last in the Iowa caucus.
lead_paragraph: DES MOINES -- Michele Bachmann declined to drop out of the Republican presidential contest despite having come in last in the Iowa caucus, receiving only about 5 percent of the vote.
